chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The sexually licentious (morally unrestrained) man uses not only flowers, but soup to seduce women into sexual acts.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and " 𦳝 ", the original meaning is shaking and swinging. "The Three Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Gong Xi": "Qi Hou and Cai Ji ride in a boat and swing the public. The public is afraid and change color; it is forbidden."

" Dang " can mean shock, turbulence. "The Book of Rites‧The Book of Music": "The earth is full of air, the weather is falling, the yin and the yang are rubbing together, and the world is shaking." Zheng Xuan's note: "Dang, still moving."

" Danging " can also mean washing and clearing. "Book of Rites‧Funyi": "So the eclipse of the emperor will serve the emperor, and the post of the six officials will be the world's sun." Zheng Xuan's note: "Dang, clean, get rid of the evil."

" Dang " can also mean destruction and destruction. "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yuxia": "Husband Zhou, Gaoshan, Guangchuan, and Daxu also, so it is a good material to be able to grow, but You Wangdang thinks of Kui Ling, dung, and ditch."

" Dang " can also mean bohemian. "Shu‧Biming": "Shilu's family, Xianke Yuli, to shake Lingde, it is against the way of heaven."

" Dang " also means flat. "Poetry‧Qifeng‧Nanshan": "Lu Dao has swings, and Qi Ziyou return." Mao Chuan: "Dang, easy."

" Dang " also refers to collision and touch. Tang Liu Zongyuan's "Three Rings-The Ass of Guizhou": "(The tiger) is a little closer to Yixie, leaning against the air, the donkey is too angry, but the hoof."

" Dang " is also an ancient name for water. Today it is called Tangshui, located in the northern border of Tangyin County, Henan Province. "Shuowen": "The water flows out of Hanoi to dangle in the shadows, and east into the Huangze. From the water, sound."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and " 𦳝 ", the original meaning is shaking and swinging.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「𦳝」聲，本義為搖動、擺動。《左傳‧僖公三年》：「齊侯與蔡姬乘舟于囿，蕩公。公懼，變色；禁之，不可。」

　　「蕩」可表示震蕩、激蕩。《禮記‧樂記》：「地氣上齊，天氣下降，陰陽相摩，天地相蕩。」鄭玄注：「蕩，猶動也。」

　　「蕩」也可表示蕩滌、清除。《禮記‧昏義》：「是故日食則天子素服，而脩六官之職，蕩天下之陽事。」鄭玄注：「蕩，蕩滌，去穢惡也。」

　　「蕩」還可表示毀壞、破壞。《國語‧周語下》：「夫周，高山、廣川、大藪也，故能生是良材，而幽王蕩以為魁陵、糞土、溝瀆。」

　　「蕩」亦可表示放蕩不羈。《書‧畢命》：「世祿之家，鮮克由禮，以蕩陵德，實悖天道。」

　　「蕩」也指平坦。《詩‧齊風‧南山》：「魯道有蕩，齊子由歸。」毛傳：「蕩，平易也。」

　　「蕩」還指沖撞、觸碰。唐柳宗元《三戒‧黔之驢》：「（虎）稍近益狎，蕩倚衝冒，驢不勝怒，蹄之。」

　　「蕩」也是古水名，今稱之湯水，在河南省湯陰縣北境。《說文》：「水，出河內蕩陰，東入黃澤。从水，𦳝聲。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「𦳝」聲，本義為搖動、擺動。

  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • 湯 [ tāng ] soup, gravy, broth; hot water
①清除，弄光：蕩平。掃蕩。蕩除。傾家蕩產。
②洗滌：洗盪。滌盪。盪口(漱口)。
③搖動：搖盪。盪漾。蕩槳。
④行爲不檢，不受約束：蕩逸。放蕩。浪蕩。蕩子。蕩婦。狂蕩。蕩檢逾閑。
⑤四處走動：遊蕩。逛蕩。
⑥廣大平坦的樣子：浩蕩。
⑦淺水湖：蘆花蕩。

Chinese: The sexually licentious (morally unrestrained) man uses not only flowers, but soup to seduce women into sexual acts.
Meaning: licentious
Hanzi: 荡
Story: The sexually licentious (morally unrestrained) man uses not only flowers, but soup to seduce women into sexual acts.
Kind: traditional

從「 水 」，「 𦳝 」聲，本義為搖動、擺動。《左傳‧僖公三年》：「齊侯與蔡姬乘舟于囿，蕩公。公懼，變色；禁之，不可。」 「 蕩 」可表示震蕩、激蕩。《禮記‧樂記》：「地氣上齊，天氣下降，陰陽相摩，天地相蕩。」鄭玄注：「蕩，猶動也。」 「 蕩 」也可表示蕩滌、清除。《禮記‧昏義》：「是故日食則天子素服，而脩六官之職，蕩天下之陽事。」鄭玄注：「蕩，蕩滌，去穢惡也。」 「 蕩 」還可表示毀壞、破壞。《國語‧周語下》：「夫周，高山、廣川、大藪也，故能生是良材，而幽王蕩以為魁陵、糞土、溝瀆。」 「 蕩 」亦可表示放蕩不羈。《書‧畢命》：「世祿之家，鮮克由禮，以蕩陵德，實悖天道。」 「 蕩 」也指平坦。《詩‧齊風‧南山》：「魯道有蕩，齊子由歸。」毛傳：「蕩，平易也。」 「 蕩 」還指沖撞、觸碰。唐柳宗元《三戒‧黔之驢》：「（虎）稍近益狎，蕩倚衝冒，驢不勝怒，蹄之。」 「 蕩 」也是古水名，今稱之湯水，在河南省湯陰縣北境。《說文》：「水，出河內蕩陰，東入黃澤。从水，𦳝聲。」
From the sound of " water" and " 𦳝", the original meaning is shaking and swinging. "The Three Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Gong Xi": "Qi Hou and Cai Ji ride in a boat and swing the public. The public is afraid and change color; it is forbidden." " Dang" can mean shock, turbulence. "The Book of Rites‧The Book of Music": "The earth is full of air, the weather is falling, the yin and the yang are rubbing together, and the world is shaking." Zheng Xuan's note: "Dang, still moving." " Danging" can also mean washing and clearing. "Book of Rites‧Funyi": "So the eclipse of the emperor will serve the emperor, and the post of the six officials will be the world's sun." Zheng Xuan's note: "Dang, clean, get rid of the evil." " Dang" can also mean destruction and destruction. "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yuxia": "Husband Zhou, Gaoshan, Guangchuan, and Daxu also, so it is a good material to be able to grow, but You Wangdang thinks of Kui Ling, dung, and ditch." " Dang" can also mean bohemian. "Shu‧Biming": "Shilu's family, Xianke Yuli, to shake Lingde, it is against the way of heaven." " Dang" also means flat. "Poetry‧Qifeng‧Nanshan": "Lu Dao has swings, and Qi Ziyou return." Mao Chuan: "Dang, easy." " Dang" also refers to collision and touch. Tang Liu Zongyuan's "Three Rings-The Ass of Guizhou": "(The tiger) is a little closer to Yixie, leaning against the air, the donkey is too angry, but the hoof." " Dang" is also an ancient name for water. Today it is called Tangshui, located in the northern border of Tangyin County, Henan Province. "Shuowen": "The water flows out of Hanoi to dangle in the shadows, and east into the Huangze. From the water, sound."

蕩字的基本解释

蕩
dàng
见“荡”。

蕩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dàng］
［《廣韻》徒朗切，上蕩，定。］
“偒1”的今字。“荡1”的繁体字。亦作“蘯1”。“1”的被通假字。
(1)摇动；摆动。
(2)引申为动摇。
(3)震荡；激荡。
(4)引申为萌动。
(5)流，排泄。
(6)洗涤。
(7)荡涤；清除。
(8)毁坏；破坏。
(9)恣纵；放荡不羁。
(10)诱惑；迷惑。
(11)平坦。
(12)引申为平等。
(13)广大。
(14)引申为渺茫。
(15)宽恕。
(16)闲逛。
(17)冲撞；冲杀；触碰。
(18)浅水湖；沼泽。
(19)心悸。一种心动加速的症状。
(20)同“簜”。大竹。
(21)姓。春秋宋有荡泽。见《左传·成公十五年》。
[②]［tàng］
［《廣韻》他浪切，去宕，透。］
“荡2”的繁体字。亦作“蘯2”。通“趟3”。
量词。
[③]［tāng］
［《集韻》他郎切，平唐，透。］
“荡3”的繁体字。亦作“蘯3”。
古水名。即今之汤水，在河南省

蕩字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蕩； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1058第42
【唐韻】徒朗切【集韻】【韻會】待朗切，?音盪。大也。【論語】蕩蕩乎民無能名焉。　又【釋名】蕩，排盪去穢垢也。【禮·昏義】蕩天下之隂事。　又【禮·月令】仲冬諸生蕩。【註】蕩謂物動萌芽也。　又【書·畢命】以蕩陵德。【傳】放蕩也。　又【書·盤庚】今我民用，蕩析離居。【註】播蕩也。　又【詩·大雅】蕩蕩上帝。【傳】蕩蕩，法度廢壞貌。　又姓。【春秋·僖二十五年註】宋桓公生子蕩，後以蕩爲氏。　又他浪切，音儻。義同。　又底朗切，音黨。【周禮·地官·稻人】以溝蕩水。【註】謂以溝行水也。　又【前漢·揚雄傳】雄爲人?易佚蕩。【註】佚蕩，緩也。　又他郞切，音湯。地名。【史記·魯仲連傳】止于蕩隂不進。【註】河內有蕩隂縣。　又水名。【前漢·地理志】蕩水東至內黃澤。　又坦朗切。平易也。【詩·齊風】魯道有蕩。徐邈讀帑。

蕩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蕩字的起名意思

暂无。

swing
Basic explanation of words
swing
dàng
See "swing".
swing
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dàng］
["Guangyun" Tu Langqie, Dangdang, Ding. ]
The present word for "偒1". Traditional Chinese characters for "Dang 1". Also known as "蘯1". "1" was passed falsely.
(1) Shake; swing.
(2) The extension is vacillation.
(3) Shock; shock.
(4) The extension is sprouting.
(5) Flow, excretion.
(6) Washing.
(7) Washing; clearing.
(8) Destruction; destruction.
(9) Indulgence; bohemian.
(10) Temptation; Confusion.
(11) Flat.
(12) The extension is equality.
(13) The vastness.
(14) By extension, it is vague.
(15) Forgiveness.
(16) Hang out.
(17) Crash; Crash; Touch.
(18) Shallow lake; swamp.
(19) Palpitations. A symptom of rapid heartbeat.
(20) Same as "簜". Otake.
(21) Last name. The Spring, Autumn and Song Dynasty are full of waves. See "Zuo Zhuan·Fifteen Years of Cheng Gong".
[②]［tàng］
["Guangyun" He cuts, goes down, and sees through. ]
"Dang 2" in traditional characters. Also known as "蘯2". Pass "trip 3".
quantifier.
[③]［tāng］
["Jiyun" he cut, flat Tang, through. ]
"Dang 3" in traditional characters. Also known as "蘯3".
Ancient water name. Now the soup, in Henan Province
swing
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Characters] 　 Dang; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1058 Page 42
[Tang Yun] Tu Langqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Waiting for Langqie, the sound will fluctuate. Big too. [The Analects] The people are incompetent.　 [Release name] Dang, to get rid of the filth. 【Rite·Fun Yi】The shame of the world.　[Rite·Moon Order] In midwinter, all the lives are swayed. [Note] Swing is also a budding thing.　[Book·Life] To Danglingde. [Biography] Debauchery too.　[Book·Pangeng] Today I am used by civilians and live apart. [Note] Broadcasting also.　[Poetry·Daya] Dangling God. [Biography] Dangdang, the law is ruinous and ruinous.　Another last name. [Spring and Autumn·Xi Twenty-five Years Note] Song Huan gave birth to son Dang, and later named Dang as his clan.　He waved and cut again, sounding. The same meaning.　 Di Langche again, music party. [Zhou Li·Diguan·Rice Man] Drift the water with the ditch. [Note] It is also said that the ditch travels with water.　[Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Being a man? Yi Yi Dang. [Note] Lost and slowed down.　 Again he cuts, sound soup. Place name. [Historical Records · Lu Zhonglian Biography] Stopped in the shadows. [Note] Hanoi has Dang Yin County.　Also known as water. [Pre-Han Geography] Dangshuidong to Neihuangze.　Frankly again. Easy and easy. [Poetry·Qi Feng] Lu Dao is full of swings. Xu Miao read the poem.
